text: The Sant Surdas (Sihi) metro station (formerly known as NCB Colony (Good Year) metro station) is located on the Violet Line of the Delhi Metro in Faridabad, Haryana. ==History== As part of Phase III of the extension of Delhi Metro, Sant Surdas (Sihi) is the extension of Violet Line.
